description: Sakura is Tsubaki`s younger sister by one year, albeit more fashionable and outgoing. In the manga she meets Kyouta at Hibino`s school festival and falls harbors a crush on him, but is rejected during a summer trip. She is dating Nishiki, Kyouta`s best friend. It is implied that they have had sex on many occasions. She is a huge supporter of Tsubaki`s relationship with Kyouta, and often advises her on what to do.
name: Hibino Sakura
